scripts.pretest: rimraf tests-out screenshots test-summary test-results && tsc --incremental -p tests/tsconfig.json
scripts.pretest:public: rimraf tests-out screenshots test-summary test-results && tsc --incremental -p tests-public/tsconfig.json
scripts.build:extension: cd clients/apps/browser && rimraf build && npm run build
scripts.build:extension:prod: cd clients/apps/browser && rimraf build && npm run build:prod
scripts.seed:vault:ciphers: npm run seed:vault:ciphers:ci && kill $(ps -e | grep 'bw serve' | grep -v 'vault-seeder' | awk '{print $1}')
scripts.seed:vault:ciphers:refresh: ./scripts/cli-serve-helper.sh && REFRESH=true ts-node ./scripts/vault-seeder.ts && kill $(ps -e | grep 'bw serve' | grep -v 'vault-seeder' | awk '{print $1}')
scripts.setup:extension: rimraf clients && git clone https://github.com/bitwarden/clients.git clients && cd clients && npm ci
scripts.setup:vault: npm run seed:vault:account && npm run seed:vault:ciphers
scripts.test:public: npm run pretest:public && NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=ssl.crt playwright test tests-public
scripts.test:public:debug: npm run pretest:public && NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=ssl.crt playwright test tests-public --debug
scripts.test:public:headless: npm run pretest:public && NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=ssl.crt HEADLESS=true playwright test tests-public
scripts.test:static: npm run pretest && NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=ssl.crt playwright test
scripts.test:static:debug: npm run pretest && NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=ssl.crt playwright test --debug
scripts.test:static:headless: npm run pretest && NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=ssl.crt HEADLESS=true playwright test
scripts.test:static:autofill: npm run pretest && NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=ssl.crt playwright test tests/autofill-forms.spec.ts
scripts.test:static:autofill:headless: npm run pretest && NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=ssl.crt HEADLESS=true playwright test tests/autofill-forms.spec.ts
scripts.test:static:notification: npm run pretest && NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=ssl.crt playwright test tests/notification-bar.spec.ts
scripts.test:static:notification:headless: npm run pretest && NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=ssl.crt HEADLESS=true playwright test tests/notification-bar.spec.ts
scripts.test:static:inline-menu: npm run pretest && NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=ssl.crt playwright test tests/inline-menu.spec.ts
scripts.test:static:inline-menu:headless: npm run pretest && NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=ssl.crt HEADLESS=true playwright test tests/inline-menu.spec.ts
scripts.test:webserve:bitwarden: cd clients/apps/web && ENV=cloud npm run build:oss:watch
